snippet: Bausch & Lomb, the eye care products maker, has hired Goldman Sachs to explore a sale of the company in the hopes of fetching more than $10 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.
abstract: Bausch & Lomb, the eye care products maker, has hired Goldman Sachs to explore a sale of the company in the hopes of fetching more than $10 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bausch & Lomb Said to Hire Goldman to Explore a Sale
